Rules for BTC Bull Runs: - Average down on alts if you're a long-term.  - Buy all the BTC dips  That's it. Good luck.

In an alt bear market, whenever $BTC moves alts dump and recover less each time.  In an alt bull market, whenever BTC moves alts dump and recover more the next time.  There will still be dips, don't get shaken out.  $crypto  p.s. in a BTC bear market don't buy alts.
